Creates a new agent with the specified parameters.

<Heading
  id={"request"}

>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"name":{"type":"string","maxLength":100,"minLength":1,"title":"Name","description":"The display name of the agent, mainly for representation purposes","examples":["Drizzle","Smarty"]},"type":{"type":"string","maxLength":100,"minLength":1,"title":"Type","description":"The type of the agent","examples":["weather"]},"description":{"anyOf":[{"type":"string","description":"Detailed of the agent's purpose and capabilities","examples":["An agent that checks the weather"]},{"type":"null"}],"title":"Description"}},"additionalProperties":false,"type":"object","required":["name","type"],"title":"AgentCreationParams","example":{"description":"An agent that checks the weather","name":"Drizzle","type":"weather"}}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
